SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwVampireCheckScript
short doOnce
short fbmwVampClan   ;used to determine clan.  1 = Aundae, 2 = Berne, 3 = Quarra
; fbmwPCVampire     variable added as a safety measure to prevent conflicts with Oblivion's VampireScript. Changed to global
short currentday
short fbmwdaycount
short fbmwhasdisease
short VampDream
short fbmwdoOnce

;this is going to be a combination of Morrowind's and Oblivion's Vampire script

begin GameMode
	
if (doonce == 0)
	set VampDream to -1
	set doonce to 1
endif
	
if (fbmwPCVampire == -1) || (PCVampire == -1)
	return
endif
	;Acquiring Vampirism and preventing the player from joining multiple clans

	If (fbmwhasdisease == 0) && (player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSaundae == 1)  
		set fbmwhasdisease to 1
		;PrintToConsole "DEBUG: Variable hasdisease has been set to 1"
	ElseIf (fbmwhasdisease == 0) && (player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSquarra == 1)
		set fbmwhasdisease to 1
		;PrintToConsole "DEBUG: Variable hasdisease has been set to 1"
	Elseif (fbmwhasdisease == 0) && (player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSberne == 1)
		set fbmwhasdisease to 1
		;PrintToConsole "DEBUG: Variable hasdisease has been set to 1"
endif
	
If (fbmwhasdisease == 1) && (player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSaundae == 0 && player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSberne == 0 && player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSquarra == 0)
		set fbmwhasdisease to 0
endif

;_________________________________________________________________

If (fbmwhasdisease == 1)
	if (currentday == 0)
		set currentday to Gameday
	else
		if (currentday != GameDay)
			set fbmwDayCount to (fbmwDayCount + 1)
			set currentday to GameDay
			;PrintToConsole "DEBUG: fbmwDayCount has increased by 1"
		endif
	endif
endif

if (fbmwhasdisease == 1)
	if ( currentday == 0 )
		set currentday to GameDay
	else
		if currentday != gameday
		set fbmwdaycount to ( fbmwdaycount + 1 )
		set currentday to GameDay
		endif
	endif
endif



;________________________________________________________________________________

If (fbmwPCVampire == 1)
	if (fbmwDoOnce == 0) && (PCVampire > -1)
		Messagebox "I dreamt of a blond maiden. I drew near, and saw she was crying, but her tears were red as blood. I touched her tears and tasted them, and they were wonderfully salty, sharp with spice and savor. But the maiden's face had changed, her skin grey-white, and red tears dripped from her lips, and her hair had turned black, and wreathed her head like twining snakes. I was afraid, but could not run. I screamed, and then I woke, heart pounding, cramped and aching.", "Ok"
		set fbmwhasdisease to -1
		set fbmwPCVampire to 2
		player.addspell 0vampireSsunSdamage
		player.addspell 0vampireSattributes
		player.addspell 0vampireSskills
		player.addspell 0vampireSimmunities
		player.addspell 0vampireStouch
		player.addspell 0vampireSlevitate
		addtopic 1vampires ;only seems appropriate...
		addtopic 1vampires1
		addtopic 1berne
		addtopic 1quarra
		addtopic 1aundae
		set PCVampire to -1
		StartQuest fbmwVAVampDreams
		StartQuest fbmwvarimintil
		StartQuest fbmwvashashev
		StartQuest fbmwvavamprich
		StartQuest fbmwvavampcurequest
		StartQuest fbmwvavampCurse
		StartQuest fbmwvavampblood2
;_____________________________________This part will set Vampire Questgivers to have the appropriate dialogue. All of them have been tested and they were not attacked (thankfully). They will be added back when the player is no longer a vampire
		fbmwIrarak.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		SanvynSLlethri.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		FathasaSLlethri.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		fbmwRaxleSBerne.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		fbmwMastrius.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		mwSirilonweREF.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		fbmwMerta.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		fbmwVolrina.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		mwRavenOmaynREF.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		DerarSHlervu.setfactionrank 0factMorrowind -1
		fbmwAundaeRef.SetFactionRank 0factMorrowind -1
		fbmwSinyaramen.SetFactionRank 0factMorrowind -1
		set fbmwDoOnce to 2
	endif
endif

end

;_______________________________________________________________

begin MenuMode

if (PCVampire > -1)
if ( fbmwhasdisease == 1 )
	if ( fbmwdaycount >= 3 )
		if (IsPCSleeping == 1)
			WakeUpPC
			set fbmwPCVampire to 1
			;PrintToConsole "DEBUG: fbmwPCVampire set to 1. VampCheckScript"
;This next part determines the Player's Clan. 0 = Cattle, 1 = Neonate. Because the Player is considered an "accident," he/she will not be going up in Rank.
;The Player will not be joining the VampireFaction. Who knows what issues that would cause?
			if (player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSaundae == 1)
				player.removespell 0vampireSbloodSaundae
				player.SetFactionRank 0ClanSAundae 1
				player.addspell 0vampireSaundaeSspecials
				StartQuest fbmwvavampchild
				StartQuest fbmwvavamphunter
			elseif (player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSberne == 1)
				set fbmwVampClan to 2
				fbmwRaxleSBerne.enable      ;Helps if the questgiver isn't disabled...
				player.removespell 0vampireSbloodSberne			
				player.SetFactionRank 0ClanSBerne 1
				player.addspell 0vampireSberneSspecials
				StartQuest fbmwvavampblood
				StartQuest fbmwvavampContess
			elseif (player.IsSpellTarget 0vampireSbloodSquarra == 1)
				set fbmwVampClan to 3
				player.removespell 0vampireSbloodSquarra
				player.SetFactionRank 0ClanSQuarra 1
				player.addspell 0vampireSquarraSspecials
				StartQuest fbmwvavampamulet
				StartQuest fbmwvavampcult
			endif
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

end

CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
